description: build: use gomake instead of make inside top-level Makefile

messages.text:
Hello r, dsymonds (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://goprotobuf.googlecode.com/hg

On 2011/04/12 18:41:11, mkrautz wrote:
> Hello r, dsymonds (cc: mailto:golang-dev@googlegroups.com),
> 
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://goprotobuf.googlecode.com/hg

I tried to build goprotobuf on FreeBSD, but it was a bit cumbersome because the top-level Makefile had make hardcoded. Swapped it for gomake instead, and all was well.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/goprotobuf/source/detail?r=6704d35f5688 ***

build: use gomake instead of make inside top-level Makefile

R=r, dsymonds
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/4373056

Committer: Rob Pike <r@golang.org>

subject: code review 4373056: build: use gomake instead of make inside top-level Makefile
